creator: Lydia Patrick,Athena Stavrou and Maira Butt
title: Russia-Ukraine war – live: Baby injured and families trapped under rubble as Putin’s troops hit record losses
dc:creator: Lydia Patrick,Athena Stavrou and Maira Butt
content: Four more people may be under the rubble, including a child, authorities said
contentSnippet: Four more people may be under the rubble, including a child, authorities said

creator: Dasha Litvinova
title: Russia’s Supreme Court effectively outlaws LGBTQ+ activism in a landmark ruling
dc:creator: Dasha Litvinova
content: Russia’s Supreme Court has effectively outlawed LGBTQ+ activism, in the most drastic step against advocates of gay, lesbian and transgender rights in the increasingly conservative country
contentSnippet: Russia’s Supreme Court has effectively outlawed LGBTQ+ activism, in the most drastic step against advocates of gay, lesbian and transgender rights in the increasingly conservative country

creator: Konstantin Testorides and Derek Gatopoulos
title: Russia's Lavrov faces Western critics at security meeting, walks out after speech
dc:creator: Konstantin Testorides and Derek Gatopoulos
content: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has faced Western critics while attending international security talks in Northern Macedonia
contentSnippet: Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov has faced Western critics while attending international security talks in Northern Macedonia

creator: Seth Borenstein
title: Pressure builds to eliminate fossil fuel use as oil executive takes over climate talks
dc:creator: Seth Borenstein
content: The pressure to phase out of fossil fuels is mounting on the oil company chief who Thursday took over fragile international climate negotiations that opened in Dubai amid concerns about what some say is contradictory dual roles
contentSnippet: The pressure to phase out of fossil fuels is mounting on the oil company chief who Thursday took over fragile international climate negotiations that opened in Dubai amid concerns about what some say is contradictory dual roles

creator: Hanna Arhirova
title: Russian missile strikes in eastern Ukraine tear through buildings and bury families in rubble
dc:creator: Hanna Arhirova
content: Ukrainian officials say Russian missiles tore through apartment buildings in eastern Ukraine’s Donetsk region during the night
contentSnippet: Ukrainian officials say Russian missiles tore through apartment buildings in eastern Ukraine’s Donetsk region during the night

creator: Courtney Bonnell
title: Inflation in Europe falls to 2.4%. It shows interest rates are packing a punch
dc:creator: Courtney Bonnell
content: Europeans are again seeing some relief as inflation dropped to 2.4% in November, the lowest in more than two years
contentSnippet: Europeans are again seeing some relief as inflation dropped to 2.4% in November, the lowest in more than two years

creator: Shweta Sharma
title: Putin urges Russian women to have ‘eight or more’ children amid soaring deaths in his Ukraine war

content: Russian president says women having large families is ‘our goal for the coming decades’

title: Senior Russian general ‘killed by one of Putin’s own landmines’ in Ukraine

content: It comes amid week of heavy losses for Russia with five other officers killed in Ukrainian airstrike

creator: Courtney Bonnell and Josh Boak
title: OPEC+ suppliers struggle to agree on cuts to oil production even as prices tumble

title: Irish premier travels to Dubai for ‘consequential’ Cop28
